Class Round

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.Round

  • public class Round
extends java.lang.Object
    Class representing a game's Round.
    Author:
    Federico Haag

      • Round

        public Round(int roundNumber,
             int numberOfTurns,
             java.util.List<Player> players,
             DraftPool draftPool)
        Constructor of a new Round.
        Parameters:
        roundNumber - progressive number of the round
        numberOfTurns - how many turns has the new round
        players - list of players playing in the new round
        draftPool - instance of the round's draftpool

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
              throws NoMoreTurnsAvailableException
        Proceed the game going to the next turn (if available).
        Throws:
        NoMoreTurnsAvailableException - if the method is called but all the turns that could have been played in this round were actually already played

      • removeNextTurnOfPlayer

        public boolean removeNextTurnOfPlayer(Player player)
        Removes the next turn of the specified player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player whose turn needs to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the operation was successful, otherwise false
